subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Football
lead_paragraph: Mr. Chandnois was a special-teams star with the Pittsburgh Steelers whose average on kickoff returns was second only to that of Gale Sayers in N.F.L. history.
snippet: Mr. Chandnois was a special-teams star with the Pittsburgh Steelers whose average on kickoff returns was second only to that of Gale Sayers in N.F.L. history.
